original_text: and you shall attack every fortified city and every choice city, and shall fell every good tree and stop up all springs of water and ruin every good piece of land with stones.”
korean_text: 당신들이 모든 견고한 성읍과 모든 아름다운 성읍을 치고 모든 좋은 나무를 베고 모든 샘을 메우고 돌로 모든 좋은 밭을 헐리이다 하더니

sentences.original_text: and you shall attack every fortified city
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 모든 견고한 성읍을 칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall fell every good tree
and stop up all springs of water
and ruin every good piece of land with stones.
sentences.korean_translation: 돌로 모든 좋은 땅을 황폐하게 할 것이니라
